project.Title: Trinket Variety Project
project.ItemDescription:
Welcome to Trinket Variety Project. A mod aiming to bring more variety in the trinkets you can find when playing. The goal was to add more universal trinkets since some class mods lack interesting trinkets.
[h1]Features[/h1] - 170 trinkets for you to collect - Craftable trinkets. Collect Unidentified weapons and use them on a curio in the Hamlet to create weapons trinkets with Enchantements and Traits - Collect powerful Lost Relics by going on a though missio. These are aimed at the late game - New quest in the Cove where you collect lost shipments which have a chance to give Enchanted Trinkets or Unidentified Weapons - Brigand Scavenger that drops Unidentfied Weapons if you manage to kill him quickly enough - Class Equipments for vanilla + dlc classes that aim to make less interesting skills viable and make interesting builds (atleast 2 per class)
[h1]Trinket Damage Types[/h1] You will notice that some of the trinkets have damage of a certain type like 'Fire'. Each damage type gives a hidden damage boost based on a condition. Below are all the current damage types:
- FIRE: 10% more damage vs Beast - LIGHT: 10% more damage if torch above 50 - SHARP: 10% more damage vs Bleeding - TOXIC: 10% more damage vs Man - MAGIC: 10% more damage vs Eldritch - DARK: 10% more damage if torch below 50 - HOLY: 10% more damage vs Unholy - POISON: 10% more damage vs Blighted
I added these damage types mostly for asthetic reasons as it looks nice on the tooltip xD.
[h1]Synergies[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1434005342]Monster Variety Project[/url] If you use both mods then you get the following things: - Ambusher on Relic quest can be one of the mini-bosses of Monster Variety - Some monsters from Monster Variety have chance to drop Unidentfied Weapons
